title: Mac Pro hands-on: Apple's $6,000 powerhouse
description: Apple unveiled the new Mac Pro today at WWDC. Starting at $5,999, the most powerful Mac is staging a comeback this fall. Although its a new design, the Mac Pro is also a throwback to Apples classic cheese grater look. The interior is structured for modularity and flexibility, addressing one of the big pain points of the outgoing Mac Pro design.
